## GerstnerWaveGenerator.setOrigin() method

Sets the X and Z coordinates of the wave origin if it is an omni-directional wave.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setOrigin(waveIndex: number, x: number, z: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  waveIndex | number | index of the wave to set. |
|  x | number | X coordinate of the wave origin |
|  z | number | Z coordinate of the wave origin |

**Returns:**

void
